ConnectionStrings.ConexaoPadrao: Server=tcp:sisrhdb.database.windows.net,1433;Initial Catalog={Nome do seu Db no Microsoft Azure};Persist Security Info=False;User ID={seuLogin};Password={seupassword};MultipleActiveResultSets=False;Encrypt=True;TrustServerCertificate=False;Connection Timeout=30;
